message.mierno.activation_ritual.title: - Division Sigil Activation Ritual -
message.mierno.activation_ritual.cansees: %s Can the altar see the sky
message.mierno.activation_ritual.brightn: %s Is the brightness around the altar low enough
message.mierno.activation_ritual.sacrifi: Sacrifice a willing creature on the altar.
message.mierno.cant_enter_nether: You need the Sigil of Rage to enter the Nether
message.mierno.enter_maze: A mysterious force pulls you into the maze
message.mierno.maze_beginning_1: This is the starting point of the maze
message.mierno.maze_beginning_2: The exit is at the diagonal corner from the start
message.mierno.maze_beginning_3: If you want to leave the maze, look up and right-click with the Dream Lantern to return to spawn
message.mierno.end_room_1: Congratulations on reaching the end of the maze!
message.mierno.end_room_2: Right-click my head, and I'll pull you up
message.mierno.end_room_3: And reward your patience and perseverance generously
message.mierno.maze_locating_success: Maze found! Watch the pointer on your Maze Compass
message.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_no_: Please ensure that there are no §centities§r within the construction area of the Colossal Furnace.
Please ensure that there are no §cblocks other than the core§r within the construction area of the Colossal Furnace.
The Colossal Furnace frame is incomplete. §a26§r are required, but %s are missing.
message.mierno.terra_plate_error: The current structure of the Terra Cohesive Plate is incorrect, please check the Terra Cohesive Plate mission for more information.
message.mierno.game_pass:
Player %s has obtained the Pseudo-Inversion Sigil!
Time taken: %s!
Thank you for playing!
tooltip.mierno.oak_mortar: Right-click to grind items in off-hand
tooltip.mierno.source_flower_2: Similar to the Daisy mechanism, requires source magic and can automatically absorb source from Source Jars within 6 blocks
tooltip.mierno.meteorite_compass1: Right-click to locate the nearest maze
tooltip.mierno.meteorite_compass2: The compass pointer will point towards the maze's direction
tooltip.mierno.meteorite_compass3: If the compass spins rapidly, there's a maze in the current chunk (mazes generate at Y20 underground)
tooltip.mierno.dream_latern: Right-click to return to spawn point
tooltip.mierno.black_lotus: Created by throwing a Mystical Flower into the void
tooltip.mierno.fire_starter: Hold right-click on a block to start a fire
tooltip.mierno.fired_crucible_1: Right-click or throw §7Gray Concrete§r into it
tooltip.mierno.fired_crucible_2: Will produce lava when there's a heat source below
tooltip.mierno.fired_crucible_3: Check JEI for valid heat sources and their speed bonuses
tooltip.mierno.fired_crucible_4: Can be emptied with a bucket when full (1000 mB)
tooltip.mierno.fired_crucible_5: Shift + Right-click with empty hand to remove items
tooltip.mierno.oak_crucible_2: Can be emptied with a bucket when full (1000 mB)
tooltip.mierno.oak_crucible_3: Shift + Right-click with empty hand to remove items
tooltip.mierno.gensousitu_bucket_1: Can interact with certain blocks to produce minerals, check Ponder and JEI for details
tooltip.mierno.gensousitu_bucket_2: Has the same properties as infinite water source
tooltip.mierno.composter: Each layer of compost provides one bonemeal
tooltip.mierno.ancient_aura_generator_co: Place leaves within a 3-block radius of the core
Leaves will be absorbed by the core to generate aura
Each leaf can convert into 10000 aura
When nearby aura exceeds a certain value, aura generation will stop
Placing a generation catalyst below the core will break this limit and double the aura production
tooltip.mierno.dream_lantern_1: Wearing this protects you from mist damage in the Misty Forest
tooltip.mierno.dream_lantern_3: Also helps you see more clearly in the Misty Forest
tooltip.mierno.dream_lantern_4: Look up and right-click to return to spawn point
tooltip.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_1: The Colossal Furnace is a multiblock structure with more powerful features than a regular furnace
tooltip.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_2: §cHold 26+ §aColossal Furnace Frames§r and right-click the §aColossal Furnace Core§c to automatically build the furnace
tooltip.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_3: All sides can be used for item input/output with pipes/hoppers
tooltip.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_4: Top, left, and right sides are for material input, back side for fuel input
tooltip.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_5: Front and bottom sides are for output
tooltip.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_6: Place furnaces in upgrade slots to increase efficiency
tooltip.mierno.colossal_furnace_core_7: §aEach furnace increases processing speed by 1% and adds 1 input slot
tooltip.mierno.cobble_gen_4: Can automatically output cobblestone to containers above
tooltip.mierno.portable_crafting_table_1: Right-click while held to open crafting table
tooltip.mierno.portable_crafting_table_2: Press [%s] to open when in inventory
tooltip.mierno.modular_runic_altar_core_: Supports §eSparks§r for §bMana Input§r (requires manual reset when connecting new sparks)
Any §aLiving Stone Brick§r in the Modular Runic Altar can be replaced with §aItem Input§r, §cItem Output§r or §bMana Input§r
tooltip.mierno.overworld_ore: Can be mined in the §aOverworld§r using the §bVoid Ore Miner§r
tooltip.mierno.terrestrial_agglomeration: Place above the Terra Plate (parallel to the sparkles, see JEI) for modular construction
Acts as §bMana Input§r in the modular system, supports §eSparks§r (requires manual reset when connecting new sparks)
Any §ePatterned Livingwood Planks§r can be replaced with §aItem Input§r, §cItem Output§r or §bMana Input§r
tooltip.mierno.memory_source_drawing_cry: §aEach Memory Source Gem provides 1 minute of drawing time
tooltip.mierno.third_eye_1: Grants the 'Third Eye' ability when worn
tooltip.mierno.third_eye_2: 'Third Eye': Immunity to darkness effects in other dimensions
tooltip.mierno.third_eye_3: Reveals hidden Iesnium Ore, Otherworld Trees, etc.
tooltip.mierno.third_eye_4: Can also highlight nearby monsters by consuming mana
tooltip.mierno.market_can_buy: Can be purchased in the 'Small Shop' section of 'Welcome' chapter
tooltip.mierno.memory_source_drawing_cry: A multiblock machine that extracts memory source from creatures placed inside the crystal
Requires Memory Source Gems to function, each gem provides 1 minute of drawing time
Creatures being extracted from will lose their AI and cannot die (health will be maintained at half)
All blocks in the multiblock structure are explosion-proof (also Wither-proof), safe to use
Note: One crystal can only extract one type of memory source
tooltip.mierno.divination_rod_1: Shift + Right-click §aOtherworld Stone§r to attune the rod to §aIesnium Ore§r
tooltip.mierno.divination_rod_2: After attuning, hold right-click to detect
tooltip.mierno.divination_rod_3: After detection, look for nearby §awhite highlight lines§r, there will be §aIesnium Ore§r at these locations
tooltip.mierno.divination_rod_4: You can also get hints from the rod's color, more purple means closer to ore
tooltip.mierno.flux_dust: Obtained by throwing Redstone Dust into a Nether Portal
tooltip.mierno.colorless_gem: Without Dream Eyes, carrying this will give you darkness and blindness effects
tooltip.mierno.unstable_ingot: Explodes after 10 seconds when in inventory or dropped
tooltip.mierno.unstable_singularity: Explodes after 1 second when in inventory or dropped
tooltip.mierno.source_fluidlink_1: Absorbs §5Source§r from nearby Source Jars to produce §dLiquid Source§r for §aFluid Storage§r §eabove
tooltip.mierno.source_fluidlink_2: Every §5200 Source§r converts to §d100mb Liquid Source§r
tooltip.mierno.orbital_fluid_retainer_1: Can convert §bMana§r shot from §eMana Spreaders§r into §3Liquid Mana
tooltip.mierno.source_jar: Can convert mana to source at a 10:1 ratio, but only using mana spreaders
tooltip.mierno.dark_eyes: Similar to Eye of Ender, used for locating Dark Temples
tooltip.mierno.spiked_plate: Produces §cblood§r for the §4Blood Pedestal§r below by damaging creatures (§awon't reduce their health§r)
tooltip.mierno.fortress_finder: Similar to Eye of Ender, used for locating Nether Fortresses
tooltip.mierno.hardened_blood_shard: Obtained by mining Coagulated Blood with Flint and Steel
tooltip.mierno.spirit_furnace_product: Obtained by cooking an Eternal Soul Box containing %s in the §4Spirit Furnace§r
tooltip.mierno.animal_spawner: Check JEI for spawn egg recipes corresponding to each creature
tooltip.mierno.birth_spirit: Can only be crafted by players, consumes health upon crafting
tooltip.mierno.ftbquests_book: Can also press [%s] to open quests
tooltip.mierno.dark_power_gem: Obtained by throwing a Dark Gem into at least 5 blocks of flowing blood
tooltip.mierno.vengeance_ring_1: Shift+right-click to activate, allows you to see Vengeful Spirits while wearing
tooltip.mierno.vengeance_ring_2: §c§lIf you still can't see the spirit of Vengeance after activating, try wearing Spectral glasses
tooltip.mierno.clay_ball: Clay Balls are produced by placing sand near a Clay Flower
tooltip.mierno.alfheim_portal: Warning: Don't use Time in a Bottle on the Alfheim Portal Core, it may cause lag
tooltip.mierno.imbuement_chamber: The Infusion Chamber now consumes items on the pedestal after completing the infusion, this is intentional and not a bug
tooltip.mierno.modular_alfheim_portal_co: Can attach sparks, try replacing if connection fails
tooltip.mierno.eternal_water: An infinite water source that can automatically output water to fluid containers
tooltip.mierno.pinkinator_1: Crafted using a Matter Cannon loaded with Pink Paint Balls
tooltip.mierno.pinkinator_2: When used, transforms any Wither within a 16-block radius sphere into a Pink Wither
tooltip.mierno.dislocationrune: Increases the speed of Life Essence exchange with external storage, each rune provides a stackable 20% increase
tooltip.mierno.accelerationrune: Enhances the operation of Charging and Displacement Runes, each Acceleration Rune adds 1 tick, up to 19 can be used.
tooltip.mierno.xpetrified_orb: Can provide 91 experience to a Hephaestus Forge
tooltip.mierno.aureal_bottle: Can provide 35 Aurealite Energy to a Hephaestus Forge
tooltip.mierno.soul: Can provide 1 Soul to a Hephaestus Forge
tooltip.mierno.corrupt_soul: Can provide 5 Souls to a Hephaestus Forge
tooltip.mierno.enchanted_soul: Can provide 10 Souls to a Hephaestus Forge
tooltip.mierno.blood_test_tube: Can provide blood to a Hephaestus Forge
tooltip.mierno.otherworld_ore: Can be mined in the §5Otherworld§r using the §bVoid Ore Miner§r
tooltip.mierno.mistyforest_ore: Can be mined in the §fMisty Forest§r using the §bVoid Ore Miner§r
tooltip.mierno.sun_crystal_full: Leave an empty Sun Crystal under the §enoon sun§r for 100 seconds
tooltip.mierno.moon_stone_full: Leave an empty Moon Stone under the §5midnight moon§r for 100 seconds
tooltip.mierno.time_changer_1: The Time Sundial can manipulate time, fast-forwarding to any moment of day or night
tooltip.mierno.time_changer_2: Place an Item Frame on the Time Sundial, then put a Time Hand in the frame
tooltip.mierno.time_changer_3: The Time Hand's angle determines the target time, pointing straight up corresponds to midnight
tooltip.mierno.time_changer_4: After setting, drop a clock on the Time Sundial to start fast-forwarding
tooltip.mierno.time_changer_5: This consumes a lot of aura as a cost--the more time skipped, the more aura consumed
tooltip.mierno.condensed_blood: Can provide 500 blood to a Hephaestus Forge
tooltip.mierno.ritualdiviner: The Ritual Diviner can help players place ritual stones by consuming LP from the soul network and ritual stones from inventory.
tooltip.mierno.blitz_rod: Blitz can be summoned through the Altar of Birthing.
tooltip.mierno.basalz_rod: Blitz are spawned in the basalt deltas of the lower realms and can also be summoned through the Altar of Birthing
tooltip.mierno.gold_fiber: Throw the fibre under the §e noonday sun§r for 10 seconds.
tooltip.mierno.not_so_mysterious_cube: Craft does not consume Mysterious Cube
tooltip.mierno.futura_block: Craft does not consume ME Controller
tooltip.mierno.rubberwood_sapling: You can find the Rubber Tree in the Misty Forest.
tooltip.mierno.modular_mana_pool_core_1: Any §a Livingrock§r in the Modular Mana Pool can be replaced with an §a Item Input§r, a §c Item Output§r, Conjuration Catalyst or an Alchemy Catalyst.
tooltip.mierno.modular_mana_pool_core_2: Support Black Lotus (throw into structure or input core)
tooltip.mierno.modular_mana_pool_core_3: No support for Mana Tablet at this time
tooltip.mierno.ghast_tear: Ghast can be summoned by the Altar of Birthing.
tooltip.mierno.modular_imbuement_chamber: The ArchWood Planks (base positions) in the modularisation can be replaced with the Item Input and Item Output.
The default production speed is slow, and can be accelerated to 0.05 seconds by source jar within 6 blocks of the core.
tooltip.mierno.vengeance_essence: Dropped by killing Spirit of Vengeance with the Piercing Vengeance Focus
tooltip.mierno.creative_blood_drop: Using Creative Blood Dropright right click on the Blood Altar will feed it life essence up to its maximum limit.
tooltip.mierno.clibano_core: §e uses the same fuel as a furnace §r, and some recipes require the addition of souls to be fired at the same time
comment.lychee.canseesky: §7- Check if this location can see the sky
gui.tooltips.ae2.SteelNugget: Every %s items condense into one Steel Nugget
book.occultism.dictionary_of_spirits.pen:
**Objective:** Sign the blood pact
\
\
In ancient texts, the **Blood Pact of Asmodeus** is recorded as a forbidden ritual involving direct dealings with dark powers to achieve unspeakable purposes. The ritual's name comes from the legendary demon Asmodeus, who is said to hold the keys to hell and can manipulate human desires and fears.
ritual.mierno.blood_pact_of_asmodeus.sta: Ritual: Blood Pact of Asmodeus has begun.
ritual.mierno.blood_pact_of_asmodeus.fin: Ritual: Blood Pact of Asmodeus is complete.
ritual.mierno.blood_pact_of_asmodeus.int: Ritual: Blood Pact of Asmodeus was interrupted.
ritual.mierno.blood_pact_of_asmodeus.con: Not all requirements for this ritual have been met.

advancement.mierno.oak_mortar.title: Primitive Technology
advancement.mierno.crucible.title: Something from Nothing
advancement.mierno.crucible.desc: Obtain a Crucible or Oak Crucible
advancement.mierno.gold_fiber.title: 180 Days of Sun, Gold Fiber Delicious and Fresh
advancement.mierno.engraving.title: Canvas and Palette
advancement.mierno.engraving.desc: Obtain an Engraving Table or Token Template
advancement.mierno.ancient_aura_generato: Obtain an Ancient Aura Generator Core
advancement.mierno.mist_die.title: You Dare Ignore the Lantern?!
advancement.mierno.mist_die.desc: Die from mist damage in the Misty Forest

mierno.welcome.main.subtitle: §cThis pack is currently in production phase. If you encounter any issues, please join Discord or post in Github. Thank you for your cooperation
mierno.welcome.main.desc1: §cThis modpack is designed for players who have a certain understanding of various mods and automation.§r
mierno.welcome.main.desc2: In the early stages, manual work is inevitable, but early tasks will provide plenty of materials to speed up the process.
mierno.welcome.main.desc3: The creation of this modpack is purely a personal hobby. Although I have invested a lot of time and effort, my personal capabilities are limited, so it may not meet the needs of every player.
mierno.welcome.main.desc4: If this modpack does not suit your preferences, remember that you can exit the game at any time without any pressure.
mierno.welcome.special_thanks.title: Special Thanks
mierno.welcome.special_thanks.tyumen: §6Qiuming§r - Provided promotion and support for this pack
mierno.welcome.market.title: Small Shop
mierno.welcome.market.subtitle: You can buy some items with Emerald Blocks, remember this place
mierno.welcome.community.title: Community
mierno.welcome.community.subtitle: Feedback & Communication
mierno.welcome.community.desc1: Welcome to join our community, click the text below to get links
mierno.welcome.ae_channel.title: Change the number of channels provided by AE cables
mierno.welcome.ae_channel.subtitle: §cRequires cheat mode
mierno.welcome.backup.title: Backup
mierno.welcome.backup.subtitle: Save your world
mierno.welcome.backup.desc1: Automatic backup occurs every 30 minutes (real time)
mierno.welcome.backup.desc2: Maximum of 10 backups will be kept
mierno.welcome.backup.desc3: When exceeded, the oldest backup will be automatically deleted in sequence
mierno.welcome.backup.desc4: You can also use the command /simplebackups backup start to create a backup
mierno.welcome.backup.desc5: Backup settings can be modified in config/simplebackups-common.toml
mierno.welcome.backup.desc6: Backed up worlds are stored in the backups folder in the game directory
mierno.welcome.backup.desc7: To restore a backup, extract the backup file to the saves folder
mierno.welcome.projecte.title: [Optional] Simple Mode
mierno.welcome.projecte.subtitle: You can choose whether you need the Transmutation Table
mierno.welcome.projecte.desc1: The ProjectE mod is not part of the quest progression, you can remove this mod if not needed without any impact
mierno.welcome.projecte.desc2: Note: All items' EMC is set to 1, but EMC will not show in item tooltips
mierno.welcome.projecte.desc3: Note: Transmutation Table does not record NBT, so some special items (e.g., Bottled Sunlight, ME Infinite Concrete Component) cannot be transmuted normally
mierno.capsule.misty_forest_portal_subti: §6→【Click Me】← View how to activate the Misty Forest Portal
mierno.chapter1-1.white_concrete.subtitl: §6Infinite Concrete Components can be obtained in the 'Welcome' chapter
mierno.chapter1-1.oak_sapling.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View how to obtain Oak Saplings
mierno.chapter1-1.oak_sapling.desc1: Oak Saplings can be planted on White Concrete
mierno.chapter1-1.oak_sapling.desc2: You can go to the 'Capsule' chapter to get capsules for quick structure placement
mierno.chapter1-1.oak_sapling.desc3: You can press the Shift key to boost plant growth
mierno.chapter1-1.gold_leaf.subtitle: §6Drops from mature Golden Leaves
mierno.chapter1-1.gold_leaf.desc2: After waiting for a while, the leaves will turn into mature Golden Leaves
mierno.chapter1-1.bottle_mist.subtitle: §6Use Bottle and Cork to right-click air in the Misty Forest to collect Bottled Mist
mierno.chapter1-1.tree_ritual.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View the Forest Ritual capsule
mierno.chapter1-1.nature_altar.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View the Nature Altar capsule
mierno.chapter1-1.offering_table.subtitl: §6→【Click Me】← View the Offering Table capsule
mierno.chapter1-1.animal_spanwer.subtitl: §6→【Click Me】← View the Animal Spawner capsule
mierno.chapter1-1.ancient_aura_gen.subti: §6→【Click Me】← View the Ancient Aura Generator capsule
mierno.chapter1-2.find_maze.title: §6Discover the Maze
mierno.chapter1-2.enter_misty_forest.sub: §6→【Click Me】← View the Misty Forest Portal capsule
mierno.chapter1-2.terra_plate.title: §cThe Terra Plate needs a new structure to work
mierno.chapter1-2.terra_plate.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View the Terrestrial Agglomeration Altar capsule
mierno.chapter1-2.alfheim_portal.subtitl: §6→【Click Me】← View the Alfheim Portal capsule
mierno.chapter1-2.mana_to_source.subtitl: §6As shown, Mana can be converted to Source at a 10:1 ratio, but only using Mana Spreaders
mierno.chapter1-2.elven_portal_conversio: §6Place Living Rock within 5 blocks radius of an active Elven Portal Core, it will be converted to Glimmering Stone
mierno.chapter1-2.wilden_summon.title: §eSummon the Wilden Chimera
mierno.chapter1-2.wilden_summon.subtitle: §6Before activating the ritual, make sure to throw Wilden Horn, Wilden Spike, and Wilden Wing into the ritual brazier to summon the Boss
mierno.chapter1-2.wilden_summon.desc1: §cFriendly reminder: This Boss may explode and destroy blocks, do not summon it in your base!
mierno.chapter1-3.assembly_room.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View the Assembly Room capsule
mierno.chapter1-3.matter_mixer.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View the Matter Mixer capsule
mierno.chapter1-3.void_ore_minner.subtit: §6→【Click Me】← View the Void Ore Miner capsule
mierno.chapter2-1.enter_nether.title: §6Enter the Nether
§6Using Source Steel Axe to kill mobs can increase head drop rates
mierno.chapter2-1.oil_drilling_rig.subti: §6→【Click Me】← View the Oil Drilling Rig capsule
mierno.chapter2-1.printing_room.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View the Printing Room capsule
mierno.chapter2-1.memory_source_drawing_: §6→【Click Me】← View the Memory Source Drawing Crystal capsule
mierno.chapter2-2.enter_otherworld.title: §6Enter the Otherworld
mierno.chapter2-2.enter_otherworld.subti: §6Wear the Dream Eye and use the Token of Terror to right-click a bed in the Nether to enter the Otherworld
mierno.chapter2-2.iesnium_ore.subtitle: §cNaturally generated Iesnium Ore must be mined with an §aInfused Pickaxe§r or §aIesnium Pickaxe§r
mierno.chapter2-2.check_environmental_ac: The §eEnvironmental Accumulator§r is located in the center of the §4Dark Temple§r, emitting a beacon beam at its location
mierno.chapter2-2.dark_gem.subtitle: Do not keep using §eEnvironmental Accumulator§r, as this §cdestroys the surroundings and has a negative effect on creatures§r, §aso please make a Sanguinary Environmental Accumulator as soon as possible to replace it§r
mierno.chapter2-2.open_blood_pact_of_asm: §6Click to view ritual: §4Blood Pact of Asmodeus
mierno.chapter2-2.open_craft_djinni.desc: §6Click to view ritual: §eHigher Binding of Striga
mierno.chapter2-2.afrit_essence.desc: §eHint: You can spawn a cow using the Altar of Birthing, please check JEI for the cow spawn egg recipe
mierno.chapter2-3.hephaestus_forge.subti: §6→【Click Me】← View how to activate and use the Hephaestus Forge
mierno.chapter2-3.blood_converter.subtit: Why not make a Creative Blood Drop
mierno.chapter2-3.blood_altar.subtitle: §6Click me See how to upgrade the Blood Altar
mierno.chapter2-3.ritualdiviner_desc1: Craft a Master Ritual Stone and place it in a 'suitable' position.
mierno.chapter2-3.ritualdiviner_desc2: While sneaking, hold it and use left or right mouse button to switch between rituals to build. After selecting the target ritual, right-click the Master Ritual Stone with the Ritual Diviner to automatically consume and place ritual stones from your inventory and automatically apply the runes. Whether runes are needed or not, each ritual stone consumes 100LP from the soul network, and no corresponding rune items need to be in your inventory.
mierno.chapter2-3.ritualdiviner_desc3: Note that if the position where a ritual stone needs to be placed is not air, the Ritual Diviner will automatically skip this location and continue placing other ritual stones.
mierno.chapter2-3.ritualdiviner_desc4: In your inventory, hold shift while hovering over this item to see all ritual stones and runes needed for that ritual.
mierno.chapter2-3.demon_realm.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View how to enter the Demon Realm§6
mierno.chapter2-3.demon_realm.desc1: Find a special room that can be accessed using an iron key.
mierno.chapter2-3.demon_realm.desc2: A reward chest in this room will always generate a『 §6Foreman’s Key§r 』.
mierno.chapter2-3.demon_realm.desc3: Hint: The room where this keyhole is located has『 §eSpatial Distortion§r 』.
mierno.chapter2-3.demon_realm.desc4: Find a mine room that requires a『 §6Foreman’s Key§r 』to open.
mierno.chapter2-3.demon_realm.desc5: The reward chest in the mine will generate『 §bArtisan’s Relic§r 』and Yellow Orchids.
mierno.chapter2-3.demon_reactor.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View how to activate the Demon Reactor
mierno.chapter2-3.clibano_core.subtitle: §6→【Click Me】← View how to build the Clibano Core
mierno.chapter3-1.reach_moon.title: §6Reach Moon
mierno.chapter3-1.reach_mars.title: §6Reach Mars
mierno.chapter3-1.reach_venus.title: §6Reach Venus
mierno.chapter3-1.reach_mercury.title: §6Reach Mercury
mierno.chapter3-1.reach_glacio.title: §6Reach Glacio
mierno.chapter3-3.pseudo_inversion_ritua: §6→【Click Me】← View Pseudo Inversion Ritual capsule
kubejs.ponder.ancient_aura_generator.tex: Place leaves within 3 blocks radius of the core
Leaves will be absorbed by the core, converting into aura, each leaf converts to 10000 aura
When nearby aura exceeds a certain value, aura generation will stop
Placing a Creation Catalyst below the core will break this limit and produce double the original aura
kubejs.ponder.clibano.text_1: Refer to the 'Capsule' chapter to obtain a capsule for quickly placing this structure
kubejs.ponder.clibano.text_2: Use Mundabitur Dust to sneak right into the Clibano Core.
kubejs.ponder.demon_reactor.text_1: Once the build is complete, right click on the Devil's Eye to activate the Devil's Reactor
kubejs.ponder.division_ritual.text_1:
To activate the Division Sigil, several conditions must be met:
1. The ritual must be placed correctly
2. Current time must be midnight
3. The altar must be open to the sky
4. The altar surroundings must be dark enough
kubejs.ponder.division_ritual.text_2: Right-click the Enchanting Table with the Division Sigil to check if the conditions are met
kubejs.ponder.division_ritual.text_3: Once all conditions are met, throw the Division Sigil onto the Enchanting Table
kubejs.ponder.division_ritual.text_5: If everything goes well, the Division Sigil will be activated
kubejs.ponder.elven_portal_conversion.te: Place Livingrock within a 5-block radius of the activated Elven Portal Core
The Livingrock will be converted into Glimmerstone
kubejs.ponder.first_tree.text_1: First, we need to build a structure
kubejs.ponder.first_tree.text_2: Once the structure is complete, right-click the block at the bottom
kubejs.ponder.first_tree.text_3: Refer to the 'Capsule' chapter to obtain a capsule for quickly placing this structure
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge.text_1: Refer to the 'Capsule' chapter to obtain a capsule for quickly placing this structure
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge.text_6: Sneak-right-click the Forging Table with Mundabitur Dust
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge.text_7: Place the required crafting materials on Darkstone Pedestals, which can be positioned in these spots
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge.text_8: The pedestals can also hold Mystical Crystal Obelisks, which will slowly recharge the Hephaestus Forge with Glimmer Energy
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge.text_9: After placing the required crafting materials, right-click the Forging Table with the Forging Hammer to start the ritual
Use the Ritual Diviner staff to select the 'Falling Star Mark' to set up the ritual.
Once the ritual is set up, right-click on the main ritual stone with the activation crystal, and 250,000 LP from the Soul Network is required to activate the ritual.
Throw the Falling Star Mark onto the main ritual stone.
After a short period, a giant meteor will fall towards the ritual.
The meteor will crash into the first block it hits, so it is recommended to build a protective shield above the ritual to prevent the meteor from damaging it.
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_1: Once the altar is built, it will slowly absorb ambient energy and store it in the Nature Altar
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_2: Place the item to be infused into the Nature Altar. If the altar has enough ambient energy stored, the item will be infused
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_3: Catalysts can be placed in these four positions
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_4: With catalysts in place, the Nature Altar will gain additional recipes
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_1: The Offering Table must be surrounded by flowers
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_3: Then, throw the activation item onto the Offering Table
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_4: If successful, lightning will strike above the Offering Table
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_5: After a short wait, the offered items will rain down from the sky
kubejs.ponder.pathway_to_the_endless_rea: Use the Ritual Divination Staff to select the 'Pathway to the Endless Realm' and set up the ritual.
Once the ritual is set up, right-click the Master Ritual Stone with an Activation Crystal, consuming 150,000 LP from the Soul Network to activate it.
Right-click the Inversion Pillar to enter the Demon Realm.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_1: The Spirit Furnace requires a multi-block structure to function
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_10: If the Eternal Soul Box contains a Ghast, the Spirit Furnace must be 6x6x6 in size, with the hollow interior being 4x4
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_2: Construct a hollow structure using Bloodstained Dark Bricks
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_3: Place the Spirit Furnace on any side
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_4: The Spirit Furnace can be connected using pipes
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_5: Adjust the size of the Spirit Furnace based on the size of the creature in the Eternal Soul Box
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_6: For example, if the Eternal Soul Box contains a Pillager, which is 2 blocks tall, the Spirit Furnace must be 3x4x3, with the hollow interior being 2 blocks tall
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_8: If the Eternal Soul Box contains a Wither Skeleton or Enderman, which are 2-3 blocks tall, the Spirit Furnace must be 3x5x3, with the hollow interior being 3 blocks tall
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_9: In this case, add an extra layer
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_1:
§lFirst, place
§a§lthe required items
§e§lon the Wooden Pedestals in any order
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_3:
§lYou can place blocks below to
§a§lmark the positions
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_4:
§lNext, place the specified sapling
§e§lfrom the ritual recipe
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_5: §lWait for the sapling to grow§a§l or use bone meal to speed it up
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_6:
§lIf the items are correct, the ritual will begin
§e§lconsuming the Golden Leaf Powder, tree, and the items on the pedestals
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_7: §a§lAfter the ritual, the resulting item will appear
